attributes.action: support & protect the McCanns, as British subjects, at their unfair treatment by the Portugese authorities.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel strongly, as do many people across the country, that the McCann family are being unfairly treated by the PJ & I feel that as British subjects they should be protected & helped by the government to prevent unsubstantiated accusations being made against them.  The evidence would seem to be flimsy & at best mis-judged by the PJ.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
